scripts.build:angular-elements: cd angular-elements && npm run build && npm run link
scripts.build:vite-lit: cd vite-lit && npm run link && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:angular-elements && npm run build:vite-lit
scripts.preinstall: cd angular-elements && npm install && cd ../vite-lit && npm install
scripts.start: npm run build && cd vite-lit && npm run dev -- --open
